name: Wiz
description: Search Wiz for Issues and Vulnerabilities by CVEs and Assets by IP Addresses, Domains, and CVEs

options.name: Authentication Token Domain
options.description: The Domain used to obtain your WIZ Authentication Token

options.name: API Region
options.description: The region where the API User resides.  (e.g. us1, us2, eu1, eu2 ...)

options.name: Query Issues
options.description: Uncheck if you don't wish to Query Issues. (Can be done in response to 504 error)

options.name: Query Vulnerabilities
options.description: Uncheck if you don't wish to Query Vulnerabilities. (Can be done in response to 504 error)

options.name: Query Assets
options.description: Uncheck if you don't wish to Query Assets. (Can be done in response to 504 error)
